title: Won My Promo Games (2-1) But Didn't Promote?
body: So recently I won my promo games (b2-b1; 2-1score) but I didn't promote. After I won my third game, I received a message notifying me that "I have qualified for my promotion".  I do not remember dodging a queue so can someone help me with this issue? Thanks!

replies.body: It looks like you had a [queue dodge ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging)during your series, which counts as a loss.  That counted a second loss which brought the series to an end.  Be sure to stay in-game after accepting a match, and play it out.  Good luck in your next series!
